constituent: heal, sickness, hospital, pup tent, large, St. Bernard, sun, day, small, little
koohiiStory1: On the battlefield, the only place to heal from your sickness is inside the medic's pup tent. Think of M.A.S.H.
koohiiStory2: Sick caveman has to sleep in his pup tent. Not the cave because to humid and cold but a nice small pup tent in the sun will heal him from his cold.
words:
診療(しんりょう): medical examination and treatment, diagnosis
治療(ちりょう): medical treatment
医療(いりょう): medical care, medical treatment
